Diana: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and have proof. We should vote to arrest Charlie now to protect the town."

You: "Diana, if you're the detective and investigated Charlie, that's crucial information. Charlie, your response seems evasive - if you're innocent, why not directly deny being mafia instead of questioning Diana's methods?"
